definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-26" y="18"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_text"><field name="VAR">global:CurrentPlayer</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="GetPlayerUuid"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:modifier</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><comment pinned="false" h="50" w="234">This will take a text field contents and send it to players when triggered.</comment><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="GetPlayerUuid"/></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">, ce n'est pas ton tour !</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
